706635f-a.text:
119-129 Schermerhorn Street, north side, between Boerum Place and
Smith Street.
June 1, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
706635f-a.folder: Schermerhorn Street & Boerum Place, Brooklyn, NY

706634f-a.text:
110-118 Schermerhorn Street, south side, between Boerum Place and Smith Street, showing the Friend's (Hicksite) Church and School.
April 7, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.

The Friend's Church and School should be

The Religious Society of Friends (Quaker) Meetinghouse - Brooklyn Monthly Meeting.

(Hicksite) is correct

School (to the left of the Meetinghouse)
706634f-a.folder: Schermerhorn Street & Boerum Place, Brooklyn, NY

706636f-a.text:
121-135 Schermerhorn Street, north side, east from Boerum Place to Smith Street, across site for Central Courts Building.
October 5, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
706636f-a.folder: Schermerhorn Street & Boerum Place, Brooklyn, NY
